page.title: 11LIFE STYLES
page.content: The present owner has been the tenant of Swiss Cottage,the old South Lodge of Worden Park,for 10 years.The cottage was the only reason for her moving to Leyland.The house has overhead cables connecting it to the mains,and power cuts are frequent.The cottage is not connected to main drains,but instead has huge sceptic tanks.She has 3 children,all of whom grew up in Leyland,and are now working.She has found that the facilities around her are not good enough as she is more than a mile from the nearest shopping area.As the house is secluded she has often been burgled ,and valuable items have been stolen.This has prompted her to buy an Alsation.she has discovered the area is very rough(drugs etc.)and this has made her wish to move from the area.
